The weather in Smallenske

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

8 minutes ago.
There will be a military historic holiday in Smolenska on Father's Day
Within the Smolene Park, located in the TEC-2 area, realistic decorations re-established under these drawings and fortification facilities will be installed.
45 minutes ago
Smolone through the court proved the right to an early insurance pension.
However, she was appointed to the resident of the regional centre only after the intervention of the court martials.
Today, 11:00.
The EGGER has supported the renovation of the old Gagarin school.

The project was implemented through a social agreement between the enterprise and the Smole region


Today, 10:31
The Smylenians assisted the SVOs to the Father ' s Defence Day
On 19 February, a truck carrying cargo was sent to a special military operation from Smolenska, which helped the regional and urban areas. Veterans ' councils, businesses in the region and unsatisfactory residents.
Today, 09:55
13 schools partially and three completely quarantine in the Smole region
At the regional office, the Survey reported on influenza epides, RWI and coronavirus.
Today, 9:19
Slaughtered the entire Russian youth enterprise programme
The guys met the governor of the Smole province of Vasili Anohin.
Today, 08:41
Smolars are invited to a thematic excursion on SBS events
On 25 February, at 13.00, the 1941-1945 Museum of the Great Patriotic War invited the moles and guests of our city to a thematic tour of the " Prostate " exhibition on the special military operation in eastern Ukr...
Today, 08:03
The school from Desnosnyorsk will present the Smolensk region on the final of the Russian competition, " Start the game "

Final of the second season of the Russian competition for the search and development of talents in the " Start the game " of the presidential platform“Russy – Country of opportunity”To be held from 1 to 5 March in the Republic of Tatarstan. A student in grade 9 is claiming victory...

Today, 07:24
Mayor Smolenska has commissioned cosmetical repairs in urban buildings
Today, a global planet was held, during which Alexander Novikov presented a visit to the Gorvokanala last Friday, 16 February.
Today, 07:01
The onepolar world order era has been completed: " One Russia " has held the first international forum for freedom of nations!
One Russia conducted the first International Forum of Supporters to Combat Contemporary Practices of Colonialism, Freedom of Nations! It brought together representatives of the leading political forces of Africa, Asia, the Middle East, Latin America, Europe ...
Yesterday, 23:00.
Smoke was convicted for the map.
The Smolensk Industrial District Court handed down a sentence for the secret theft of foreign property.
yesterday, 21:50
Smolin oblasts are invited to become participants in Legis Tour guides
They will be able to demonstrate their knowledge and develop new authoritative tourist routes. Applications for an educational programme for professionals and travellers of the Lega Tour guide industry are extended until 26 February, including...
yesterday, 21:02
In Smolenska, one of the main streets of the city will be blessed.
The repair work is planned to be done on the ground. October revolution. Splinters can vote for a good project.
Yesterday, 8:30.
In the Smole region, a cow, a caban and a mustle were rescued from fire
According to the press service of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, the fire occurred in a private bathhouse in the village of Preclear Garina district.
yesterday, 20:06
Smolen veterans will be able to become anthans
Under the " Cyber Russia " project, a training programme for PSB participants, " Trade number " , is under way. Fighters from the Smole region will be able to learn a new profession.
Yesterday, 19:30.
In the Smole region, the Day of Search was celebrated.
The festival was officially approved by the Smole Regional Duma in 2021.
yesterday, 18:37
Over 12 million roubles won the hotel.
To win, you had to guess all the combinations.
yesterday, 17:28
In 2023, the Smole region received 61 new school buses
Work in this direction has been reported by Senator RF of our region, Ruslan Smashnyev.
Yesterday, 16:54
CSD will broadcast live on health development in the Smole region

Questions for guests may be left in the comments to the annotatedpost♪

Yesterday, 16:25
“Dear” invests 250 million roubles in the reconstruction of the summer health centre
PAO " Road " (involving the Akron Group) invests 250 million roubles in the reconstruction of the Lastučka child health centre located in the Smole region.
